content: this listing is for my original crochet amigurumi pride frog pattern the pattern is super easy to make i have included lots of photo to help you along the way the finished frog measures 7 inches long and 6 inches wide arm to arm materials worsted weight yarn green for frog rainbow flag red orange yellow green blue and purple trans flag light blue pink and white non-binary flag yellow white purple and black 1- pair size 9 00 mm black safety eyes with washers scrap of black yarn or thread for nose embroidery poly-fill stuffing size g crochet hook yarn needle stitch marker techniques single_crochet half-double_crochet single_crochet 2 stitches together decrease single_crochet twice in the same single_crochet stitch increase half-double_crochet twice in the same stitch increase
